Settings.Title: Session Report Configuration
Settings.Description: Configure the API endpoint and authentication settings for the Session Report module.

EndpointURL.Name: API Endpoint URL
EndpointURL.Hint: The URL endpoint where session data will be sent

ApiKey.Name: API Key
ApiKey.Hint: API key for authentication with the endpoint

SessionId.Name: Session ID
SessionId.Hint: Unique identifier for the current session

AutoCreateSession.Name: Auto-Create New Session
AutoCreateSession.Hint: Automatically create a new session when sending a report (skips the confirmation prompt)

ShowButtonsToPlayers.Name: Show Session Report Buttons
ShowButtonsToPlayers.Hint: Enable the Session Report button on player character sheets

ActorTypeFilter.Name: Actor Type Filter
ActorTypeFilter.Hint: Specify which actor types to include (e.g., 'pc' for player characters, 'character', 'npc', etc.). Configure this based on your game system.

PusherAppKey.Name: Pusher App Key
PusherAppKey.Hint: Your Pusher application key for real-time survey results

PusherCluster.Name: Pusher Cluster
PusherCluster.Hint: Pusher cluster region (e.g., us2, eu, ap1)

TestConnection.Title: Test Connection
TestConnection.Description: Send a test request to verify the endpoint is reachable.
TestConnection.ErrorNoEndpoint: Please enter an endpoint URL first.

Survey.Title: Post-Session Character Survey
Survey.Message: Please visit the link below to complete your post-session character survey. You'll be able to vote on characters that are not your own.
Survey.Help: Click the button below to open the survey in a new tab, or copy the URL to access it later.
Survey.NoEndpoint: Please configure the API endpoint URL in module settings first.
Survey.NoPlayers: No eligible players found to send surveys to

SurveyResults.Title: Survey Results
SurveyResults.Subtitle: View completed post-session character surveys
SurveyResults.ClearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all survey results? This cannot be undone.

Modal.Title: Session Report
Modal.NoEndpoint: Please configure the API endpoint URL in module settings first.
